# Read input
N = int(input())
weights = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Calculate the minimum difference
min_diff = sum(weights)
for i in range(1, N):
    min_diff = min(min_diff, abs(sum(weights[:i]) - sum(weights[i:])))

# Print the result
print(min_diff)

N = int(input())
weights = list(map(int, input().split()))

# 全てのパターンを試す
min_diff = float("inf")
for i in range(1, N):
    s1 = sum(weights[:i])
    s2 = sum(weights[i:])
    diff = abs(s1 - s2)
    min_diff = min(min_diff, diff)

print(min_diff)

N = int(input())
W = list(map(int, input().split()))

S1 = 0
S2 = sum(W)

ans = S2
for i in range(N):
    S1 += W[i]
    S2 -= W[i]
    ans = min(ans, abs(S1 - S2))

print(ans)

S1 = 0
S2 = sum(W)
ans = S2
for i in range(N):
    S1 += W[i]
    S2 -= W[i]
    ans = min(ans, abs(S1 - S2))

print(ans)

N = int(input())
weights = list(map(int, input().split()))

s1 = 0
s2 = sum(weights)

min_diff = abs(s1 - s2)

for i in range(N-1):
    s1 += weights[i]
    s2 -= weights[i]
    min_diff = min(min_diff, abs(s1 - s2))

print(min_diff)

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    W = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))
    S1 = 0
    S2 = sum(W)
    min_diff = float('inf')
    for i in range(N):
        S1 += W[i]
        S2 -= W[i]
        diff = abs(S1 - S2)
        if diff < min_diff:
            min_diff = diff
    print(min_diff)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N = int(input())
W = list(map(int, input().split()))

# dp[i][j] = i番目までの要素で、jを超えないように選んだ時の、S1とS2の差の絶対値の最小値
dp = [[float('inf') for _ in range(sum(W)+1)] for _ in range(N+1)]
dp[0][0] = 0

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(sum(W)+1):
        if j >= W[i]:
            dp[i+1][j] = min(dp[i+1][j], dp[i][j-W[i]])
        dp[i+1][j] = min(dp[i+1][j], dp[i][j] + W[i])

ans = float('inf')
for j in range(sum(W)+1):
    ans = min(ans, abs(2*j-sum(W)))

print(ans)
